channel.title: Stupid Question.. But Where do I Put a Client?
channel.description: Im new to all this stuff and I just downloaded a client for the Project-72 client. But now where do i put it. I'm using an imac. I know how to join its server but I downloaded the rar.; converted it to a folder. So now where do i put the folder for the client? Thanks in advance and I apologize if this isnt the correct thread for this post...

item.title: Stupid Question.. But Where do I Put a Client?
item.dc:creator: @Nosferetu Nosferetu
item.source: Stupid Question.. But Where do I Put a Client?

item.title: Stupid Question.. But Where do I Put a Client?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Anywhere you want. As long as you have extracted all the files into the same folder its fine.
